Name: Lede
East Village: Boasting the best of, well, everything, the East Villages inexhaustible grid of beyond-hip bars, bookshops, cafes, clubs, and galleries cater to even the most exacting tastes.  As stylish as it is, the East Village preserves a laid-back attitude so even outsiders feel welcome when in this classic New York City neighborhood. From early morning to late-late night, the East Village brims with activity for socialites and scaliwags alike.

Name: Photo_Headers
East Village: ['The Closest Thing to Williamsburg in Manhattan', 'From Dusk Until Dawn Until Dusk Again', 'Everything You Could Hope to Eat in the East Village']

Name: Intro
East Village: Go to the East Village to experience some of New York City's best, brightest, and most bohemian culture.

Name: Photo_Captions
East Village: ['From head to toe, bike to board, sidewalk to street, the East Village indulges trendy tastes and effervescent attitudes.', "In the East Village, street style is more than a concept, it's a culture.", 'Live music, lounge music, performances and cocktails - the East Village invites you to arrive early and stay late.', 'Entertainment options are as endless as nights are long in this everything-you-could-ever-want neighborhood.', 'From early morning coffee to late-night shakes, the East Village percolates with craft-roasted beans, simple slices, and small plates meant for sharing.', 'In the East Village, old traditions and contemporary concepts share the sidewalk.']
